# Linux patches fixed missing memory barrier race conditions

Below patches are introduced to fix race condition caused by missing
memory barriers. It is not proved that our fuzzer can find them
though. Analyze them if necessary.

- c2da049f419417808466c529999170f5c3ef7d3d
- 7ee47dcfff1835ff75a794d1075b6b5f5462cfed
- 45247a85614b49b07b9dc59a4e6783b17e766ff2
- c1102e9d49eb36c0be18cb3e16f6e46ffb717964
- 592fa002180af3425ba962b8e74edd680f0ec77b
- 28d9fab458b16bcd83f9dd07ede3d585c3e1a69e
- b1f02b95758d05b799731d939e76a0bd6da312db
- e6d1fa584e0dd9bfebaf345e9feea588cf75ead2
- 6455b6163d8c680366663cdb8c679514d55fc30c
- 8a0d57df8938e9fd2e99d47a85b7f37d86f91097
- c95356ca884885db702670e24933ee7f2b9f1754
- 5f54237ad798f41cb6a503271aa9ca47188cfb9b
- 37b076933a8e38e72ffd3c40d3eeb5949f38baf3
- fe1f0714385fbcf76b0cbceb02b7277d842014fc
- 1f5d783094cf28b4905f51cad846eb5d1db6673e
- 8b8817630ae80032e80b2eaf334de756ac1ff6a3
- 8929bc9659640f35dd2ef8373263cbd885b4a072
- 939de63d35dde45dbc10bd21f174f86629fbe78d
- 2e8728c955ce0624b958eee6e030a37aca3a5d86
- 6c6ac8b7773f05f93dc4e4044686e059d1f78dea
- 1d0cb4c8864addc362bae98e8ffa5500c87e1227
- f2e030dd7aaea5a937a2547dc980fab418fbc5e7
- f6581f5b55141a95657ef5742cf6a6bfa20a109f
- 649bb75d19c93f5459f450191953dff4825fda3e - last - kernel vs user race

# Not reordering bug
- d11a5621f3252120dfc7cef7600a90bd8e605caf

# Not a bug
- 02bae7a24257947fe95fcca80c78e6cb602e94bf
